pullrequest.title: Fixing a deadlock I introduced in the base station plugin

content.raw: I found that running `virtual_stix.ign` was sufficient.  If you ctrl-c in the terminal, `ign launch` would not terminate.  In the debugger \(or print statements\), you can see that execution pauses right before the BaseStationPlugin thread is joined in the destructor.
